title: Question:
author: Black susano
content: Official  Adegboyega Adeleye "The super falcons of Nigeria have sealed a place in the round of 16 of the 2023 FIFA WOMEN'S WORLD CUP after pulling off a goalless draw against debutant republic of lreland" https://www.aljazeera.com/sports/2023 omo my people I greet una well ohhhh na this update I say mak we talk about, like play the Nigeria women world cup don start and the way I dey see tinx e be like say 9ja women wan one dey put body like play, e be like say dey draw for one of their games, but if una go watch the highlights with lreland the way Nnadozie play the game omo that girl some how dey on fire ohhhhhhh, how this upcoming game go be na Nigerian vs England beckons on Monday the matter no to clean like that but the way dey play go talk wetin dey go do.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: I think you can re arrange this thread and then move it to gambling discussion board,  because I haven't seen such a thread up over there let's discuss on the supper Falconets who have made Nigeria proud in the round of the world cup. I think other members of our local board can reason the thread too if it means moving it out since the thread is about football discussions it's will more appropriate there than here in the local board.

comments.author: RahimNda
comments.body: -super falconWe believe that Ja did an excellent job against the Republic of Ireland because we are moving on to the quarterfinals. We also hope that Ja does well against England.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Op carry this thread go to gambling board. Here na local board so gambling thread are not counted as gambling in local board but it is counted as local board thread. You think say because you a member it a newbie and since you no dey work so you can post anywhere yes you can but people see ur posts in all sections and when u wan work for a campaign, na d way u dey post for gambling board go make im employ u. So if u move dis thread go to gambling board then when time come do manager will count dis one gambling post and employ you.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 06, 2023, 09:47:52 PM~snip~My guy my guy I understand say your intention dey pure as you start this topic but e be like say you nor dey follow up as regards the your topic so because you do did, you go Sabi say we don already get one for gambling board wey we dey use discuss this football matter. Make I assume say you never see am before so I go drop the link Africa Football Discussion || Current Topic: WAFCON in FIFA Women's World Cup/23. You nor need move this topic to gambling like other users don suggest because e go come be duplication of topics just simply lock this one.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Ooo OP u probably don't know that such a post should be made on a gambling board. If you go to gambling board you will definitely see this topic where you can post about games. This is our Nigerian local board so best na to talk about gambling here. u go to Gambling Board with the post you made about the game, this post is already done.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455617.msg62369614#msg62369614

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on August 07, 2023, 04:40:48 AMAfrica Football Discussion || Current Topic: WAFCON in FIFA Women's World Cup/23. You nor need move this topic to gambling like other users don suggest because e go come be duplication of topics just simply lock this one. Going through the OP's post history, he has not made any comments in the gambling section, which makes it obvious that he might not even be aware that such a board exists.Since there is an ongoing discussion regarding everything Africa football, it will be best for the OP to lock this thread as you have suggested, and then he can copy this and drop it as a comment under the existing thread referencing this one so that the discussion can continue there as there will be a lot of members ready to engage on the women's world cup.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on August 07, 2023, 06:23:57 PMQuote from: Davidvictorson on August 07, 2023, 04:40:48 AMAfrica Football Discussion || Current Topic: WAFCON in FIFA Women's World Cup/23. You nor need move this topic to gambling like other users don suggest because e go come be duplication of topics just simply lock this one. Going through the OP's post history, he has not made any comments in the gambling section, which makes it obvious that he might not even be aware that such a board exists.Since there is an ongoing discussion regarding everything Africa football, it will be best for the OP to lock this thread as you have suggested, and then he can copy this and drop it as a comment under the existing thread referencing this one so that the discussion can continue there as there will be a lot of members ready to engage on the women's world cup.I was surprised myself on seeing this particular thread here although I don't know if OP drop it here base on the fact that our falcons were aslo participating so he thought it would be a good means for we Nigerians to follow them up. But  just like NWADA001 said there is always the gambling board which host this particular discussion. So it would be nice if he just locked this one.
